          "secure": false,
          "value": [
            {
              "value": "(function execute() {\n\n    //Get hour users local time\n    var gt = new GlideDateTime().getLocalTime().getDisplayValue();\n    gt = gt.split(':')[0];\n    //Set greeting message\n    // 13\n    // if (gt < 7) {\n    if (gt < 4) {\n        answer = gs.getMessage('Good morning');\n        // } else if (gt >= 7 && gt < 12) {\n    } else if (gt >= 4 && gt < 9) {\n        answer = gs.getMessage('Good morning');\n        // } else if (gt >= 12 && gt < 18) {\n    } else if (gt >= 9 && gt < 15) {\n        answer = gs.getMessage('Good afternoon');\n        // } else if (gt >= 18) {\n    } else if (gt >= 15) {\n        answer = gs.getMessage('Good nigth');\n    }\n    var lang = vaContext.getRequesterLang();\n    if (lang == 'en' || lang == 'En') {\n        var allAnswers = [\n            \"glad to see you.\",\n            \"hey jow\"\n        ];\n        var vaAnswer = allAnswers[Math.floor(Math.random() * allAnswers.length)];\n    } else if (lang == 'es' || lang == 'Es') {\n        var allAnswers = [\n            \"encantada de verte\"\n        ];\n        var vaAnswer = allAnswers[Math.floor(Math.random() * allAnswers.length)];\n    } else {\n        var allAnswers = [\n            \"estou feliz em te ver por aqui.\",\n            \"que bom te ver\"\n        ];\n        var vaAnswer = allAnswers[Math.floor(Math.random() * allAnswers.length)];\n\n    }\n\n    //Return message\n    if (vaInputs.user.first_name) {\n        return answer + ' ' + vaInputs.user.first_name + ' ' + vaAnswer;\n    } else {\n        return answer + ' ' + vaAnswer;\n    }\n})()\n",
              "mode": "script"
            }
          ],

            "mode": "query"
          }
        }
